title: Himi 249
lyrics:
M.L.
1.
Ke tau tuku kolōlia,
Ki he ‘Otua mo’oni,
Ko hotau mo’ui’anga,
Mo e kakai kotoa pē.
2.
Ko e poto‘anga ia,
Ki he kakai loto vale;
Ko e maama’anga ia,
Ki he kakai fakapo’uli.
3.
Ko e ‘Otua totonu,
Pea ‘afio ma’u ai pē,
Ko e Tamai, mo e ‘Alo,
Mo e Laumālie Lelei.
4.
Ko e tefito pē taha,
Ka ‘oku huafa tolu;
Ko hotau ‘Otua ia,
Mo māmani kotoa pē. *
